rules_text:
When Midnight Sighting enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Create a Sighting token and attach Midnight Sighting to it. [i](It’s a 2/2 colorless Illusion creature with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.”)[/i]
Enchanted creature has menace.
